greet.english: ✨ Hi {}, I am Tok Mate Bot and I can help you to download TikTok videos really fast. Send any TikTok links to download. Eg: https://www.tiktok.com/@hemantapkh/video/6978860931522514178 For inline download, just type @TokMateBot in any of your chats. Eg: @TokMateBot https://vm.tiktok.com/ZM8LSAUYT

enterLink.english: 🔗 Enter the TikTok link to send

clickToSend.english: 👉 Click here to send the video

privateVideo.english: ⚠️ The video is either private or don't exist.

exception.english: ⚠️ Error[1] Please report this to the us.

unknownError.english: ⚠️ Error[2] Please report this to the us.

warningTooFast.english: 🛑 You are sending messages too fast. Please slowdown or you may get banned.

blockedTooFast.english: ⛔ You have been banned for 5 minutes for spamming the bot.
